thread.title: ‘It was so brutal I changed the channel’: Tucker Carlson debates immigration lawyer David Leopold
thread.title_full: ‘It was so brutal I changed the channel’: Tucker Carlson debates immigration lawyer David Leopold

author: William A.
title: ‘It was so brutal I changed the channel’: Tucker Carlson debates immigration lawyer David Leopold
text:
‘It was so brutal I changed the channel’: Tucker Carlson debates immigration lawyer David Leopold Posted at 10:45 pm on February 13, 2017 by William A. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
On Monday night, Tucker Carlson had immigration lawyer David Leopold on to debate deportations. Will be joining @TuckerCarlson on @FoxNews at 9pm ET tonight to talk about Trump's Deportation Force raids on American communities. 
— David Leopold (@DavidLeopold) February 14, 2017 
Here’s the video clip: 
Responses: Call the Coroner to @FoxNews @TuckerCarlson has slain another #Prog It was so brutal that I changed the channel pic.twitter.com/pV1oaRHJoV
